Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red pottery jar, the fabric is grey in section, the exterior is covered with burnished cream-coloured slip and remains of two lines of black-painted hieratic text identifying the contents as 36 hin of honey, the official responsible being the agent Kamose.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393517) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393517)
